Rows.name: specObjID
Rows.description: Unique database ID based on PLATE, MJD, FIBERID, RUN2D

Rows.name: bestObjID
Rows.description: Object ID of photoObj match (position-based)

Rows.name: fluxObjID
Rows.description: Object ID of photoObj match (flux-based)

Rows.name: targetObjID
Rows.description: Object ID of original target

Rows.name: plateID
Rows.description: Database ID of Plate

Rows.name: sciencePrimary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location (defines default view SpecObj)

Rows.name: legacyPrimary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among Legacy plates

Rows.name: seguePrimary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE plates

Rows.name: segue1Primary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE-1 plates

Rows.name: segue2Primary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among SEGUE-2 plates

Rows.name: bossPrimary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location, among BOSS plates

Rows.name: sdssPrimary
Rows.description: Best version of spectrum at this location among SDSS plates (defines default view SpecObj)

Rows.name: bossSpecObjID
Rows.description: Index of BOSS observation in spAll flat file

Rows.name: firstRelease
Rows.description: Name of first release this object was associated with

Rows.name: survey
Rows.description: Survey name

Rows.name: instrument
Rows.description: Instrument used (SDSS or BOSS spectrograph)

Rows.name: programname
Rows.description: Program name

Rows.name: chunk
Rows.description: Chunk name

Rows.name: platerun
Rows.description: Plate drill run name

Rows.name: mjd
Rows.description: MJD of observation

Rows.name: plate
Rows.description: Plate number

Rows.name: fiberID
Rows.description: Fiber ID

Rows.name: run1d
Rows.description: 1D Reduction version of spectrum

Rows.name: run2d
Rows.description: 2D Reduction version of spectrum

Rows.name: tile
Rows.description: Tile number

Rows.name: designID
Rows.description: Design ID number

Rows.name: legacy_target1
Rows.description: for Legacy program, target selection information at plate design

Rows.name: legacy_target2
Rows.description: for Legacy program target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calibration

Rows.name: special_target1
Rows.description: for Special program target selection information at plate design

Rows.name: special_target2
Rows.description: for Special program target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calibration

Rows.name: segue1_target1
Rows.description: SEGUE-1 target selection information at plate design, primary science selection

Rows.name: segue1_target2
Rows.description: SEGUE-1 target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calib selection

Rows.name: segue2_target1
Rows.description: SEGUE-2 target selection information at plate design, primary science selection

Rows.name: segue2_target2
Rows.description: SEGUE-2 target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calib selection

Rows.name: boss_target1
Rows.description: BOSS target selection information at plate

Rows.name: eboss_target0
Rows.description: EBOSS target selection information at plate

Rows.name: ancillary_target1
Rows.description: BOSS ancillary science target selection information at plate design

Rows.name: ancillary_target2
Rows.description: BOSS ancillary target selection information at plate design

Rows.name: primTarget
Rows.description: target selection information at plate design, primary science selection (for backwards compatibility)

Rows.name: secTarget
Rows.description: target selection information at plate design, secondary/qa/calib selection  (for backwards compatibility)

Rows.name: spectrographID
Rows.description: which spectrograph (1,2)

Rows.name: sourceType
Rows.description: For Legacy, SEGUE-2 and BOSS science targets, type of object targeted as (target bits contain full information and are recommended)

Rows.name: targetType
Rows.description: Nature of target: SCIENCE, STANDARD, or SKY

Rows.name: ra
Rows.description: DR8 Right ascension of fiber, J2000

Rows.name: dec
Rows.description: DR8 Declination of fiber, J2000

Rows.name: cx
Rows.description: x of Normal unit vector in J2000

Rows.name: cy
Rows.description: y of Normal unit vector in J2000

Rows.name: cz
Rows.description: z of Normal unit vector in J2000

Rows.name: xFocal
Rows.description: X focal plane position (+RA direction)

Rows.name: yFocal
Rows.description: Y focal plane position (+Dec direction)

Rows.name: lambdaEff
Rows.description: Effective wavelength that hole was drilled for (accounting for atmopheric refraction)

Rows.name: blueFiber
Rows.description: Set to 1 if this hole was designated a "blue fiber", 0 if designated a "red fiber" (high redshift LRGs are preferentially in "red fibers")

Rows.name: zOffset
Rows.description: Washer thickness used (for backstopping BOSS quasar targets, so they are closer to 4000 Angstrom focal plan)

Rows.name: z
Rows.description: Final Redshift

Rows.name: zErr
Rows.description: Redshift error

Rows.name: zWarning
Rows.description: Bitmask of warning values; 0 means all is well

Rows.name: class
Rows.description: Spectroscopic class (GALAXY, QSO, or STAR)

Rows.name: subClass
Rows.description: Spectroscopic subclass

Rows.name: rChi2
Rows.description: Reduced chi-squared of best fit

Rows.name: DOF
Rows.description: Degrees of freedom in best fit

Rows.name: rChi2Diff
Rows.description: Difference in reduced chi-squared between best and second best fit

Rows.name: z_noqso
Rows.description: Best redshift when excluding QSO fit in BOSS spectra (right redshift to use for galaxy targets)

Rows.name: zErr_noqso
Rows.description: Error in "z_noqso" redshift (BOSS spectra only)

Rows.name: zWarning_noqso
Rows.description: Warnings in "z_noqso" redshift (BOSS spectra only)

Rows.name: class_noqso
Rows.description: Classification in "z_noqso" redshift

Rows.name: subClass_noqso
Rows.description: Sub-classification in "z_noqso" redshift

Rows.name: rChi2Diff_noqso
Rows.description: Reduced chi-squared difference from next best redshift, for "z_noqso" redshift

Rows.name: z_person
Rows.description: Person-assigned redshift, if this object has been inspected

Rows.name: class_person
Rows.description: Person-assigned classification, if this object has been inspected

Rows.name: comments_person
Rows.description: Comments from person for inspected objects

Rows.name: tFile
Rows.description: File name of best fit template source

Rows.name: tColumn_0
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #0

Rows.name: tColumn_1
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #1

Rows.name: tColumn_2
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #2

Rows.name: tColumn_3
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #3

Rows.name: tColumn_4
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #4

Rows.name: tColumn_5
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #5

Rows.name: tColumn_6
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #6

Rows.name: tColumn_7
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #7

Rows.name: tColumn_8
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #8

Rows.name: tColumn_9
Rows.description: Which column of the template file corresponds to template #9

Rows.name: nPoly
Rows.description: Number of polynomial terms used in the fit

Rows.name: theta_0
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #0 of fit

Rows.name: theta_1
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #1 of fit

Rows.name: theta_2
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #2 of fit

Rows.name: theta_3
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #3 of fit

Rows.name: theta_4
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #4 of fit

Rows.name: theta_5
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #5 of fit

Rows.name: theta_6
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #6 of fit

Rows.name: theta_7
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #7 of fit

Rows.name: theta_8
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #8 of fit

Rows.name: theta_9
Rows.description: Coefficient for template #9 of fit

Rows.name: velDisp
Rows.description: Velocity dispersion

Rows.name: velDispErr
Rows.description: Error in velocity dispersion

Rows.name: velDispZ
Rows.description: Redshift associated with best fit velocity dispersion

Rows.name: velDispZErr
Rows.description: Error in redshift associated with best fit velocity dispersion

Rows.name: velDispChi2
Rows.description: Chi-squared associated with velocity dispersion fit

Rows.name: velDispNPix
Rows.description: Number of pixels overlapping best template in velocity dispersion fit

Rows.name: velDispDOF
Rows.description: Number of degrees of freedom in velocity dispersion fit

Rows.name: waveMin
Rows.description: Minimum observed (vacuum) wavelength

Rows.name: waveMax
Rows.description: Maximum observed (vacuum) wavelength

Rows.name: wCoverage
Rows.description: Coverage in wavelength, in units of log10 wavelength

Rows.name: snMedian_u
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels in u-band

Rows.name: snMedian_g
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels in g-band

Rows.name: snMedian_r
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels in r-band

Rows.name: snMedian_i
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels in i-band

Rows.name: snMedian_z
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels in z-band

Rows.name: snMedian
Rows.description: Median signal-to-noise over all good pixels

Rows.name: chi68p
Rows.description: 68-th percentile value of abs(chi) of the best-fit synthetic spectrum to the actual spectrum (around 1.0 for a good fit)

Rows.name: fracNSigma_1
Rows.description: Fraction of pixels deviant by more than 1 sigma relative to best-fit

Rows.description: Fraction of pixels deviant by more than 2 sigma relative to best-fit

Rows.description: Fraction of pixels deviant by more than 9 sigma relative to best-fit

Rows.name: fracNSigma_10
Rows.description: Fraction of pixels deviant by more than 10 sigma relative to best-fit

Rows.description: Best-fit template spectrum projected onto r filter

Rows.description: Best-fit template spectrum projected onto i filter

Rows.description: Best-fit template spectrum projected onto z filter

Rows.description: Inverse variance of spectrum projected onto u filter

Rows.description: Inverse variance of spectrum projected onto g filter

Rows.description: Inverse variance of spectrum projected onto r filter

Rows.description: Inverse variance of best-fit template spectrum projected onto u filter

Rows.name: anyAndMask
Rows.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ANDMASK

Rows.name: anyOrMask
Rows.description: For each bit, records whether any pixel in the spectrum has that bit set in its ORMASK

Rows.name: plateSN2
Rows.description: Overall signal-to-noise-squared measure for plate (only set for SDSS spectrograph)

Rows.name: deredSN2
Rows.description: Dereddened signal-to-noise-squared measure for plate (only set for BOSS spectrograph)

Rows.name: snTurnoff
Rows.description: Signal to noise measure for MS turnoff stars on plate (-9999 if not appropriate)

Rows.name: sn1_g
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at g=20.20 for spectrograph #1

Rows.name: sn1_r
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at r=20.25 for spectrograph #1

Rows.name: sn1_i
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at i=19.90 for spectrograph #1

Rows.name: sn2_g
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at g=20.20 for spectrograph #2

Rows.name: sn2_r
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at r=20.25 for spectrograph #2

Rows.name: sn2_i
Rows.description: (S/N)^2 at i=19.90 for spectrograph #2

Rows.name: elodieFileName
Rows.description: File name for best-fit Elodie star

Rows.name: elodieObject
Rows.description: Star name (mostly Henry Draper names)

Rows.name: elodieSpType
Rows.description: Spectral type

Rows.name: elodieBV
Rows.description: (B-V) color

Rows.name: elodieTEff
Rows.description: Effective temperature

Rows.name: elodieLogG
Rows.description: log10(gravity)

Rows.name: elodieFeH
Rows.description: Metallicity ([Fe/H])

Rows.name: elodieZ
Rows.description: Redshift

Rows.name: elodieZErr
Rows.description: Redshift error (negative for invalid fit)

Rows.name: elodieZModelErr
Rows.description: Standard deviation in redshift among the 12 best-fit stars

Rows.name: elodieRChi2
Rows.description: Reduced chi^2

Rows.name: elodieDOF
Rows.description: Degrees of freedom for fit

Rows.name: htmID
Rows.description: 20 deep Hierarchical Triangular Mesh ID

Rows.name: loadVersion
Rows.description: Load Version

Rows.name: img
Rows.description: Spectrum Image
